text.section:
The court may appoint as receiver any responsible individual other than:
A State employee;
An employee of a local government; or
The owner or administrator of or other individual with a financial interest in the nursing home or community program or agent of any of those individuals.

section.section: Before the receiver takes charge of the nursing home or community program, the receiver shall file a bond with the court.

The bond:
May not exceed the value of the nursing home or community program and its assets; and
Shall run to this State for benefit of all persons interested in the faithful performance of the receiver including the individuals.
Unless the court directs otherwise, the receiver may pay the premium of the bond from the income of the nursing home or community program.
